properties.areaDesc: Newton; Boone; Fulton; Searcy; Marion; Baxter
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 5:21AM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
...Some freezing rain and sleet will be possible this morning...
which may create hazardous driving conditions...

* WHAT: Expect freezing rain...with some sleet mixed in.

* WHERE: Much of northern Arkansas.

* WHEN: Through 10 AM this morning.

* ACCUMULATIONS: Expect a light glaze up to around one tenth of
an inch of ice...with locally higher amounts over one tenth of
an inch in the higher terrain. Light sleet accumulations are
possible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS: Light ice accumulation may cause hazardous
driving conditions on area roadways...especially bridges and
over passes. The areas most prone to seeing ice will be in the
higher terrain of the Ozarks.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of sleet or freezing
rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery
roads...and use caution while driving.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING
